item.name: Active Temp Tables
item.description: Number of temporary tables/table variables in use.

item.name: Connection Reset
item.description: Number of logins started from the connection pool.

item.name: SQL Trace IO Provider Lock Waits

discovery_rule.name: Databases
discovery_rule.params:
<parms type="mssql" prefix="mssql."> <server> <discovery time="120" item="database.discovery.DB4bix.config[instanceid,{$DSN}]" names="DATABASE">SELECT DISTINCT name FROM [master].[sys].[databases] WHERE owner_sid!=1</discovery> <query time="60" item="database.datafile[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Data File(s) Size (KB)' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logfile[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log File(s) Size (KB)' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logfileused[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log File(s) Used Size (KB)' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logfileusedp[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Percent Log Used' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.transactions[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Active Transactions' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.transpersec[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Transactions/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logflush[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Flushes/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logflushbytes[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Bytes Flushed/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <!-- <query time="60" item="database.logflushwaits[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Flush Waits/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> --> <!-- <query time="60" item="database.logflushwaittime[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Flush Wait Time' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> --> <query time="60" item="database.logtrunc[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Truncations' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.loggrow[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Growths' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <query time="60" item="database.logshrink[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Log Shrinks' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <!-- <query time="60" item="database.committableentries[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Commit table entries' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> --> <query time="60" item="database.writetrans[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Write Transactions/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> <!-- <query time="60" item="database.tractedtrans[%1]">SELECT RTRIM(instance_name),cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Databases' AND counter_name='Tracked transactions/sec' AND instance_name NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model')</query> -->
<query time="60" item="avgwaittime">SELECT (MAX(CAST(cntr_value as float))/MIN(CAST(cntr_value as float))) FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE (counter_name='Average Wait Time (ms)' OR counter_name='Average Wait Time Base') AND instance_name='_Total'</query> <query time="60" item="cachehit">SELECT 100*(MIN(CAST(cntr_value as float))/MAX(CAST(cntr_value as float))) FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Buffer cache hit ratio' OR counter_name='Buffer cache hit ratio base'</query> <query time="60" item="iopending">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys.dm_io_pending_io_requests</query> <query time="600" item="datafile">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Data File(s) Size (KB)' AND instance_name='_Total'</query> <query time="600" item="logfile">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Log File(s) Size (KB)' AND instance_name='_Total'</query> <query time="600" item="logfileused">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Log File(s) Used Size (KB)' AND instance_name='_Total'</query> <query time="600" item="logfileusedp">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Percent Log Used' AND instance_name='_Total'</query> <query time="60" item="pagereads">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Page reads/sec' AND instance_name=''</query> <query time="60" item="pagewrites">SELECT 'pagewrites',cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Page writes/sec' AND instance_name=''</query>
<query time="120" item="pagelookups">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Page lookups/sec' AND instance_name=''</query>
<!-- <query time="120" item="freepages">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Free pages' AND instance_name=''</query> <query time="120" item="totalpages">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Total pages' AND instance_name=''</query> -->
<query time="120" item="lazywrites">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Lazy writes/sec' AND instance_name=''</query> <query time="120" item="readaheadpages">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Readahead pages/sec' AND instance_name=''</query> <query time="120" item="checkpointpages">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name='Checkpoint pages/sec' AND instance_name=''</query> <query time="120" item="sqlerrors">SELECT SUM(cntr_value) FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name like '%SQL Errors%' AND instance_name='DB Offline Errors' OR instance_name='Kill Connection Errors'</query>
<query time="120" item="mem.connection">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Connection Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.grantedws">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Granted Workspace Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.lock">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Lock Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.lockblock">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Lock Blocks'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.lockblockalloc">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Lock Blocks Allocated'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.lockownerblock">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Lock Owner Blocks'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.lockownerblockalloc">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Lock Owner Blocks Allocated'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.maxws">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Maximum Workspace Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.optimizer">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Optimizer Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.sqlcache">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='SQL Cache Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="120" item="mem.target">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Target Server Memory (KB)'</query> <query time="300" item="mem.total">SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:Memory Manager' AND counter_name='Total Server Memory (KB)'</query>
<query time="60" item="activetmptables">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Active Temp Tables'</query> <query time="60" item="tmptablerate">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Temp Tables Creation Rate'</query> <query time="60" item="logins">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Logins/sec'</query> <query time="60" item="conresets">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Connection Reset/sec'</query> <query time="60" item="logouts">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Logouts/sec'</query> <query time="60" item="userconns">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='User Connections'</query> <query time="60" item="logicconns">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Logical Connections'</query> <query time="60" item="transactions">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Transactions'</query> <query time="60" item="nonatomicyieldrate">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Non-atomic yield rate'</query> <query time="60" item="marsdeadlocks">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Mars Deadlocks'</query>
<!-- <query time="60" item="httpauthreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='HTTP Authenticated Requests'</query> <query time="60" item="soapemptyreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP Empty Requests'</query> <query time="60" item="soapsqlreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP SQL Requests'</query> <query time="60" item="soapmethinv">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP Method Invocations'</query> <query time="60" item="soapwsdlreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP WSDL Requests'</query> <query time="60" item="soapsessionstartreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP Session Initiate Requests'</query> <query time="60" item="soapsessionendreq">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SOAP Session Terminate Requests'</query> --> <query time="60" item="processesblocked">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Processes blocked'</query> <query time="60" item="tmptablesfordest">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='Temp Tables For Destruction'</query> <query time="60" item="sqltraceioprovlockwaits">SELECT cntr_value FROM master.sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE object_name='SQLServer:General Statistics' AND counter_name='SQL Trace IO Provider Lock Waits'</query>
</server> </parms>

discovery_rule.name: Performance counters
discovery_rule.params:
<parms type="mssql" prefix="mssql."> <server> <discovery time="600" item="database.discovery.DB4bix.config[perfcounters,{$DSN}]" names="ONAME|CNAME|INAME"> select * from ( SELECT TRIM(SUBSTRING(object_name, (PATINDEX('%:%',object_name)+1),LEN(object_name)-PATINDEX('%:%',object_name))) oname, TRIM(counter_name) cname, TRIM(ISNULL(NULLIF(instance_name,''), 'none')) iname FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters ) as s where iname NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model') and iname not like '%User counter%' and oname NOT IN ( 'Cursor Manager by Type' ,'Resource Pool Stats' ,'Deprecated Features' ,'LogPool FreePool' ,'Broker Statistics' ,'Broker/DBM Transport' ,'Batch Resp Statistics' ,'FileTable' ,'Columnstore' ,'External Scripts' ) and oname not like '%SQL Server 2017 XTP%' </discovery>
<query time="60" item="perf_counter[%1,%2,%3]"> select * from ( SELECT TRIM(SUBSTRING(object_name, (PATINDEX('%:%',object_name)+1),LEN(object_name)-PATINDEX('%:%',object_name))) oname, TRIM(counter_name) cname, TRIM(ISNULL(NULLIF(instance_name,''), 'none')) iname, cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters ) as s where iname NOT IN ('_Total','mssqlsystemresource','tempdb','master','msdb','model') and iname not like '%User counter%' and oname NOT IN ( 'Cursor Manager by Type' ,'Resource Pool Stats' ,'Deprecated Features' ,'LogPool FreePool' ,'Broker Statistics' ,'Broker/DBM Transport' ,'Batch Resp Statistics' ,'FileTable' ,'Columnstore' ,'External Scripts' ) and oname not like '%SQL Server 2017 XTP%' </query>
</server> </parms>

trigger.name: High number of IOs pending on {#HOST.NAME}
SQL errors increased on {#HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: The number of invalid SQL queries send to the server increased.
